name: Ironblood
description: Relentless close-range bruiser clad in steel and defiance. Every scar tells a story carved in bone and blade.

name: Runeweaver
description: Manipulator of hidden laws and elemental tongues. Draws magic not from books, but from the breath between stars.

name: Whispercloak
description: Master of silence and shadows, moving through the world like a forgotten thought. The coin always finds them.

name: Veilpiercer
description: Precision slayer who embraces death as devotion. They strike once, never twice.

name: Spelltyrant
description: A battle-hardened wielder of blade and incantation, fusing physical might with elemental wrath.

name: Pathstrider
description: Lone scout of wild places, bonded to bow and beast. Nature speaks in every step they take.

name: Gravedigger
description: Keeper of forbidden rites, walking between the heartbeat and the silence. The dead know their name.

name: Lifebinder
description: A healer blessed by the Song Below. They mend wounds and restore spirit with light, prayer, or pulse.
